string.value: Sorry. You don't appear to be in any games right now.
*{0}* has started a game! use /join to get in and get this game started!
A new game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get eated maybe!
{0} has started a chaos game! use /join to get in on the randomness!
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get chaotic!
Sorry, You're going to have to wait in line, and watch patiently until this round is done.
You're already here! You can't be here twice you sill fuzzball
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Not enough players, cancelling game!
Game is starting, wait while I assign roles, update the database, zip up all the fursuits and queue up "Try Everything".
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, change your name to join.
Sorry, max player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} furballs, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} click this: {1}, then click start. Until you do, I cannot tell you what your role is.
You can't run away! YOU'RE DEAD! Get back in the ground! Crazy furries...
{0} has fled in terror! How dare they!
{0} perverted fleabags remain.
Hey, I didn't ask you anything yet!
You... don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to go after {1}
{0} has voted to lynch {1}
*{0}* has not voted 2 nights in a row. The forces of good have seen this as a terrible crime, and as a result *{0}* gets put to the noose as an example to the rest *{1}*
You traitor!!! You are now able to get in on the mayhem as a wolf..
Choice accepted
\nThe owl is {0}
{0} was the owl. As the apprentice, you step up to become the new owl.
{0} was an apprentice, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place as the new owl.
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to lynch?
Who do you want to snoop on, ?
Who do you want to burn? {0} fireball(s) remain
Who do you want to get it on with?
Who do you want to peek at?
Who do you want to guard?
Who do you want to eat?
Who do you want to hunt?
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to convert to your order?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are a Husky (cursed). You are a villager at this time, but if the wolves choose to go for you, you will instead become a wuff yourself..
You are the rat (detective). During the day, you may choose a player to try to find out their role. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the wolves! (40% chance)
Congrats! You're the poisonous frog(drunk)! If the wolves eat you they trip out out for a whole night!
You are the Tiger(guardian angel). Each night, you may choose a player to save. However, if you choose a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will die.

You are the Dragon(gunner). You have two fireballs. During the day, you may choose to burn the clothes off of another player and knock them out of the game. Everyone will see you do it, and know you are the dragon (not a wolf).

You slut!(harlot) You are the fox. During the night, you may choose to read your fanfics another player, to verify if they are not a wolf. However - if you visit a wolf, or visit someone killed by the wolf, you will die. If you do go out though, and the wolf tries to kill you at your home, you will survive.
Traitorous Mongrel!(traitor...duh.) For now, you are a villager, but once all the wolves die, you will become a werewolf. If the owl looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a wolf.
XD YOU ARE A WOLF!! (good on ya) Each night you can choose someone to nom on!
You are the Owl(seer). Each night, you may choose a player to 'see', and reveal their role to you.
You are a lowly bunny(villager), doomed to spend your days plowing a field and probably getting nommed on.
You are the hyena(tanner). If you get lynched, you win automatically!
You are a lemur(wild child)! Pick a player to be your 'role model' - if they die, you freak out and become a werewolf.
You are the Raven(beholder), you will be told who the (real) seer is - that is your only function.
You are the owlet(apprentice seer). If the (real) seer dies, you will take their place as the seer.
You are a snake(cultist). Every night, you may choose a player to convert to a cultist. If all remaining living players at the end are cultists, they win.

There is a cultist in the town, trying to convert everyone! Each night, choose a player. If they are a cultist, you capture and kill them. If the cult tries to convert you, the newest member gets taken out.(Cult Hunter)
Dusk draws near, and the villagers gather to decide who they are lynching this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote! Make it count.
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day. Night players: you have *{0}* seconds use your actions!
The villagers have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} gets tied to the lynching post and hung for all to see. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to lynch, the mob returns to their homes for the night, frustrated...
I guess everyone spent so much time pointing that nobody voted.
The villagers gather in the morning, but do not see *{0}*. They wander over to the house, to find *{0}* missing. All that remains is an old *badge* along with several other bloodstained notes.
Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay; *{0}* is in the center of town, impaled on top of their own spear. Very, very much dead. You have lost your *tiger*.

As everyone comes out of their houses, they find signs of a struggle, some scales strewn about and markings of fire in the town square, and far off in the distance you hear a familiar roar of *{0}*. You have lost your *dragon*.
The villagers awake in the morning, to find that *{0}* is missing. Their ouija board and tarot cards, both torn by clawmarks and doused in blood. The *Owl* is dead.
Everyone wakes to find *{0}* missing. Checking the pub and find cups strewn about, some broken, some filled with barf, but more of them filled with blood and fur.

As the sun rises above the village, they find *{0}* missing. Their ouija board has been torn by giant claws and covered in blood, but their deck of... bicycle playing cards? happens to be visible, though still essentially useless. WHAT A *FOOL*!

As everyone rises in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find *{0}* lying in in the pig pen, torn apart by giant claws. Going through their things, it's clear that: \n*{1}*
A noticeable stench is coming from *{0}'s* house... the village inspects it to find a dark altar, still faintly glowing with dark power... a *cultist* has been captured by the hunter!
The villagers gather the next morning in the village center, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night, everyone seems accounted for!
You have been bitten. As the husky, you get to join them, becoming a wolf!
Your wolf counterpart(s): {0}
{0} was bitten.... but was cursed, and became a werewolf! Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! The wolves got to you and tore you apart!
Oh no! {0} was a drunk! Now you are tripping and barfing, and can't attack tomorrow night...
You tried to guard a wolf, and for your efforts get bitten and killed.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
The Tiger was watching over you last night, and fought off the wolves!
The harlot decided to take the wrong night for deciding to recover and write some new fanfics. *{0}* has been eaten by the wolves
Damn... {0} was not home! No dinner for you.
You slip into *{0}'s* house for a little fun, but only to be confronted by a wolf and the wolf doesn't seem up for hearing about your ships.

*{0}* slipped into the wrong house last night! All that's found of them is their handcuffs tied to the church doors, bloodstains from over the night, and a notebook torn to pieces on illicit pairings. The fox is dead.

*{0}* slips into *{1}'s* house, ready to have a little fun. However, they instead find a werewolf tearing *{1}* limb from limb! The werewolf quickly and forcibly drags *{0}* in to add them to the bloody mess. *{0}* is dead.
You see {0} is not a wuffer, as you were able to read to them all your lewd fanfics.

Either because of how dark it was when they did their deeds, or because they blindfolded you during the whole thing, you couldn't see exactly what the fox(harlot) did to you. Whatever it was, you do remember something about an OTP?
You caught {0} snooping about! They are the Rat!
Your snooping has shown you that {0} is {1}
Looks like {0} came back positive after a night with the Harlot! The gunner got revenge. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a loud roar sounds in the village. The village turns to see *{0}* spitting fire at *{1}* burning them to ash and cinders. A *{2}*
With that, the wolf leaps onto the remaining villager, delighting in their last meal. The *werewolf* has won!
With that, the wolves grab and leap upon the remaining villagers, enjoying their last, bloody meal... The *werewolves* have won!
With that, you see the last of the wolves killed off, the corpse shifting into a much bigger and bulkier wolf as confirmation. The *villagers* have won!
Oh no! You lynched the *Hyena*! Their laugh keeps going on within the town even as they're dead, basically meaning they win the game, silly.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... however, they were the cult hunter! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to convert you.... but you managed to lock them up below your house, taking care of one cultist. {1} remain!

The cult has converted you to their order! You are now a Snake (cultist). Every other night, you will have a chance to convert another player... When you're not, you're too busy praying to a dark god beyond space.
Snakes: {0}
{0} has joined the cult!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... but no one was home!
All the wolves have died, and the only bunnies left standing have all been converted to cultists... in celebration they open a ritual bringing forth the ender of days /n The *cult* has won!
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s house, and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god. You interrupt their chant by stabbing them through the chest.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no mysterious chanting or weird altars. They are not a cultist, so you return home.
{0}'s role model just died! In their butthurt rage, they have become a werewolf!
{0} has died! In your butthurt rage, you have become a werewolf! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Rabbit (Villager) 👱
the Poison Frog (Drunk) 🍻
the Fox (Harlot) 💋
the Owl (Seer) 👳
the Mongrel (Traitor) 🖕
the Tiger (Guardian Angel) 👼
the Rat (Detective) 🕵
a Werewolf 🐺
the Husky (Cursed) 😾
the Dragon (Gunner) 🔫
the Hyena (Tanner) 👺
the Derp (Fool) 🃏
the Lemur (Wild Child) 👶
the Raven (Beholder) 👁
the Owlet (Apprentice Seer) 🙇
a Snake (Cultist) 👤
the Weasel (Cultist Hunter) 💂
Ran away
💀 Dead
🙂 Alive
Players Alive
an Otter (Mason) 👷
You are an Otter(Mason). If there are any other Otters, you will know who they are. Otherwise, you are a villager.
As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} shoved into a pile of stone, blood splattered everywhere. One of your otters has died!
The otters are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood all over, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by white growling tiger, Who snarls and fights everyone off, and you have to head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them :(
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Change your name to join.

You slipped into {0}'s house for a bit of fun, and you end up getting your fill; but as you are leaving you happen to notice a strange altar, poorly hidden away in a side room, a strange glowing coming from it...
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around.... The villagers look around and find {0}; torn apart, and nothing to identify them by.
As the villagers gather as the sun rises, the find that {0} is missing; somehow leaving, or getting dragged away last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the daily underwater swim this morning.
Fleeing while the game is going on has been disabled by the group admin!
is dead
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game elsewhere! (probably not as fun as ours though) ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras. Stop it.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
I'm about to start a maintenance break, No games right now. \nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is too awesome for queues, and has skipped the line!
There is no game going on. Feel free to request me to start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No seer! Sorry, but good luck!
Too late. Time's up!

You are the lovebird(Cupid). You're a dirty shipper who can can sneak into peoples houses and get them attracted to each other's smell. Choose two players who will become addicted to each other's scent. If one of them dies, the other one dies of sorrow.
You are a chameleon(Doppelgänger). Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role.

You are the bear(Hunter). It's not hibernation time, so you don't sleep well and are kinda cranky. If you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are eaten, you have a chance to take a werewolf down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.
You are the Wasp(Serial Killer). Recently escaped from the local asylum, your goal is for everyone else to die. Every night, you can add a player's body to your collection.
You have been struck by love.. and a small addiction to {0}'s smell. Mostly the second one. Your goal is for both of you to survive. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow.
The village has chosen to hang you! This is your last chance, choose to kill someone as you go down!
{0} fumbles for a moment as they fight against the noose tightening, but cannot get it in time, and falls to their death with a loud snap of their neck...
{0} breaks free before they're finished being hung...but then they can't make a decision on what to do, so they accept their fate...

As the noose starts to tighten around {0} they break free before they're finished being killed and with what strength they can muster go to beat {1} into the ground just before being forcibly sentenced to death! {1}. {2}
Someone has attempted to take you out! In your last moments, you have the chance to take someone with you.... make it quick!
{0} starts to stumble out of their house looking around but before they can make a decision they let out a groan and give in to their wounds afflicted on them by their attacker.
{0} starts to stumble out of their house looking around but they can't decide who to go after.... and accept the fate given...
{0} starts to stumble out of their house looking around before turning to {1} and shoving them to the floor making sure to use the last of their rage to pulverize {1}. {2}

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, to introduce them to the wonderful world of space gods; and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a stinger! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead.
The wolves tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take one down with them as they died! {0} has died
The wolf tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take the wolf {0} down!
The wolves attempted to have a nice late night snack, but were instead greeted by a crazy person! {0} was stung to their doom!
It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The villagers gather in the morning to find {0} dead with several puncture wounds all over. The serial killer has struck again! {1}
You tried to collect {0}'s body for your organ collection, but you were fought off by the guardian angel! No kill for you tonight....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s body get thrown out the window, bruised and bloodied! {0} is dead....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....
You tried to guard the serial killer, but they came out to thank you with stabbings.
You slip into {0}'s house, and start having a little fun; it seems great until {0} starts introducing more knives to your fanfics... and to your body.
don't worry about this string for now!
The chameleon(Doppelganger) {0} has now become a mason, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into an otter. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a snake(Cult), just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a snake(Cult). Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The chameleon (Doppelganger) {0} has now become a wolf, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a wolf. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only one left is the wasp! They win, atop a pile of orgasming sluts!
Who do you want to kill tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over and falls, crying. They cannot stand the loss of their loved one, and shoot themselves with the nearest pistol the can find. {2}
Who do you want to become if they die?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player
the Bear(Hunter) 🎯
the Lovebird(Cupid) 🏹
the Hornet(Serial Killer) 🔪
the Chameleon(Doppelganger) 🎭
the musk of {0} has struck you! You are madly in love with the smell of {0}! If they die, you will die too. If you both make it to the end, you will both win.
You have become the Lemur(wild child). You role model is {0}
True love endures! The lovers have won! The lovers celebrate by skipping town.
In the middle of the town square, everyone finds the body of {0}, multiple impact marks to the body. Looks like they tried to sneak up on the Hunter! {1}
A hooded figure tried to convert you to their cult of tentacles, but your faith was too strong.
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will let you know when the next game is starting. Try not to blow too many loads in the meantime.
Hey, A new game is starting in {0} get in that game.
Morning comes, and the remaining two villagers walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, and stabs {1} 37 times with their stinger.
Everyone in the village has been killed in one shape or another No one wins this round, except the vultures.

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the village. Noticing that they're the only two left {0} goes over to sting {1}. They both struggle and fight for control, though both end up getting plenty of wounds before ending up killing each other./n The village is empty , there is no winner!
You failed to make a decision, so I had to choose for you: {0}. Pay Attention.
Won
Lost
This furball: {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf/Serial Killer/Cultists.Rolenames: Villager/Bunny.

You are the Seer/Owl. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!Rolenames: Seer/owl

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to deceive your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack the drunk/poison frog, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to attack the next night as you sleep off your hangover! If you attack the cursed/husky, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!Rolenames: Werewolf/Wuffer

As the harlot/fox, you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)Rolenames: Harlot/Fox

You drunken, poisonous bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next night, as they are tripping off your weird fluids.Rolenames: Drunk/Poison Frog
As the cursed/husky, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD Rolenames: Cursed/Husky.
You are a traitorous mongrel. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night! Rolenames: Traitor/Mongrel.

You are the Guardian Angel/White Tiger! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed. Rolenames: Guardian Angel/WhiteTiger
You snooping rat.. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you! Rolenames: Detective/Rat

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner/dragon, you are given 2 fireballs at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner/dragon! Be careful though, you only have 2 shots! Rolenames: Gunner/Dragon.
The Tanners/hyena's goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.Rolenames: Tanner/Hyena.
The fool/derp is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.Rolenames: Fool/Derp.
As a cultist/snake, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins. Rolenames: Cult/Snake.
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die. Rolenames: Cult Hunter/Weasel
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf. Rolenames: Wild Child/Lemur
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer. Rolenames: Apprentice Seer/Owlet
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool) Rolenames: Beholder/Raven.
A masons job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager. Rolenames: Mason/Otter.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover) Rolenames: Doppelganger/Chameleon

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if both lovers are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win together. Rolenames: Cupid/Lovebird

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them! Rolenames: Hunter/Bear

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live. Rolenames: Serial Killer/Wasp
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
Game Length: {0}

Mistakes have been made. An error has occurred and this node has shut down :C
I have PMed you the things.
Send me a pm so I can PM you: @werewolfbot
Thanks for starting me up!

What do? How do you wanna do this?
There's no point to joining in a singleplayer game of werewolf!
No point in playing a singleplayer game. You must start a game from within a group chat!
